name: Station Master
description:
This is an experimental game - there are significant flaws with some aspects of it.

The initial aim is to build a space station but you end up somewhere else completely.

Although this game is an idle clicker of sorts, the time scales have been compressed so the game can be played in 10-20 minutes.

Mouse controlled.

Made for TigerJ(am) #2

Made with Defold
